mapper.select: SELECT education, area, branch, subject, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, time, price, cname, cart_no FROM basket INNER JOIN course ON basket.course_no = course.course_no WHERE member_no = #{no}

SELECT pd.course_no, i_cname, i_startday, i_endday, (SELECT teacher_img_org FROM course WHERE course.course_no = pd.course_no) as teacher_img FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no = pd.order_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} AND STR_TO_DATE(i_startday, '%Y-%m-%d') <= CURDATE() AND STR_TO_DATE(i_endday, '%Y-%m-%d') > CURDATE() ORDER BY i_startday

SELECT m.member_no, pd.detail_no, c.course_no, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS pay_date, p.order_no, i_cname, i_price, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS i_startday, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS i_endday, teacher_img_org, pay_cancel, DATE_FORMAT(pay_cancel_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS pay_cancel_date, pay_refund, pay_refund_date FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no = pd.order_no JOIN course c ON pd.course_no=c.course_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY i_endday DESC;

SELECT q.qna_no, m.member_no, q_title, q_content, DATE_FORMAT(q_writedate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS q_writedate FROM member m JOIN qna q ON m.member_no = q.member_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY q_writedate

SELECT c.cname, r_title, review_no, m.member_no, r.course_no, DATE_FORMAT(r_writedate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS r_writedate FROM member m JOIN review r ON m.member_no = r.member_no JOIN course c ON c.course_no = r.course_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY r.r_writedate desc
